author: Will Leitch
title: How Screwed Is Your Favorite Sport’s Season?
description: A survey of the damage coronavirus has wrought among the NFL (fine so far), NBA (up in the air), and other major leagues.
content: One of the most difficult aspects of figuring out when everything is going to get back to normal in the sports world and there is no part of the world clinging tighter to the illusion that there will be a back to normal after all this than the sports world is… [+8174 chars]
